Info.Title: The Terminal
Info.Writer: Andrew Niccol (story), Sacha Gervasi (story), Sacha Gervasi (screenplay), Jeff Nathanson (screenplay)
Info.Actors: Tom Hanks, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Stanley Tucci, Chi McBride
Info.Plot: An Eastern European tourist unexpectedly finds himself stranded in JFK airport, and must take up temporary residence there.
Info.Language: English, Bulgarian, Spanish, Russian, Mandarin, German, French
